server

Class StrongboxHttpsServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.StrongboxHttpsServer

  • public class StrongboxHttpsServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Private key server secured by HTTPS protocol. Allow finding, adding or removing keys from the server.
    Author:
    Alexandre Colicchio, Andy Chabalier, Philippe Letaif, Thibaud Gasser

      • initSSLContext

        private javax.net.ssl.SSLContext initSSLContext()
                                         throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                                java.io.IOException
        Initialize a SSLContext.
        Returns:
        The SSLContext initialized.
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if a security manager exists and its checkRead method denies read access to the file.
        java.io.IOException - if the file does not exist, is a directory rather than a regular file, or for some other reason cannot be opened for reading.

        Parameters:
